Detecting_Problem: Detecting Problem Let’s wait for few seconds...
titleOne: Keep camera close to the crop
Desc_one: Don’t capture the whole plant. Get closer to the problem and focus on that. Move closer to your crops as much as possible so that the camera can read the problem properly.
Desc_two: Make sure your camera is focusing on the part where the plant is affected the most. Also make sure there is enough light and picture is clear. Photography in dark is not recommended or use the flash if necessary.
An_unexpected_error_occurred_Please_try_: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
no_internet_conneccted: No Internet available. Please try again after some time.
please_wait_getting_data: Please wait, while we are fetching your data...
No_pests_detected_moment_later: No pests detected at the moment.Try again later.
valid_location: Please select a valid land location.
camera_permission_message: Camera Permission is required for the application to capture Images/scan QR code
galleryDesc: Gallery Permission is required to upload images from your device.
cameraDesc: Camera Permission is required to capture images from your device.
location_error: We are unable to trace your location. Please check your location and location settings.
